name: VIDEOGAMES DEFENDER 2014
description:
Ruin Jam 2014 entry. I hate games so it's just barely playable (yes, you can finish it). Games still suck though and must be ruined.

Made in Construct 2. Works best in Chrome on non-mobile devices (music might not play in other configurations.)

Thanks to the great Badass Digest commenters and writers and all the awesome people who strive to make games and gaming better.
